lines: Your husband has become a lottery fanatic. He can't walk by the corner drugstore without spending a dollar on a lottery ticket. What will you do about this?
#NOTHING. WHATEVER HE WANTS TO DO WITH HIS MONEY IS HIS BUSINESS
#GIVE HIM A DOLLAR AND SAY, "BUY AN EXTRA ONE FOR ME!"
#TELL HIM IT MIGHT BE A GOOD IDEA TO CONSIDER HOW MUCH MONEY HE IS SPENDING ON LOTTERY TICKETS

True. It IS a hobby that he seems obsessed with. When you speak with him about it, he tells you that he is waiting for his ship to come in. He wants you to know that if he ever "hits it," you'll get half.
He buys you a ticket, and you lose together!
He buys you a ticket and you win $2000! Will you split it with him?
You can't reason with a gambler. He says he HAS to win one of these times, and when he does, you'll both be on easy street. (Sure!)
